<!-- source-hash: 86e4aac7ba1a4ca2317217b469d1f5f2 -->
A DTO (Data Transfer Object) that represents available filter options for event queries, containing lists of user IDs and event types that can be used to filter events in the system.

## Key Components

- **userIds** - List of available user identifiers for filtering events by user
- **eventTypes** - List of available event type names for filtering events by type
- **@Schema** annotations for OpenAPI documentation generation
- **Lombok** annotations for automatic getter/setter/builder generation

## Usage Example

```java
// Building an event filter response
EventFilterResponse filterResponse = EventFilterResponse.builder()
    .userIds(Arrays.asList("user123", "user456", "user789"))
    .eventTypes(Arrays.asList("LOGIN", "LOGOUT", "PURCHASE", "VIEW"))
    .build();

// Accessing filter options
List<String> availableUsers = filterResponse.getUserIds();
List<String> availableTypes = filterResponse.getEventTypes();

// Typical API response usage
@GetMapping("/events/filters")
public EventFilterResponse getEventFilters() {
    return eventService.getAvailableFilters();
}
```

This response DTO is typically used by frontend applications to populate filter dropdowns or selection components, allowing users to choose from actual available values rather than guessing filter criteria.
